original_title: The Infectious Imagination of Henry Bramble
overview: Henry is forced to stay with his passionless great-uncle and slips into a fantastical world where he meets Raygo, an elf-like hunter who reveals that all he needs to restore his uncle's imagination is a single drop of blood from a hideous beast that enjoys sucking people's brains out of their eye sockets.
title: The Infectious Imagination of Henry Bramble
